/* com.koscom.main.dao.MainMapper.getMainConsumeSumAmt */
SELECT CASE WHEN PSI.DT_BASIC IS NULL THEN( SELECT NVL( SUM( AMT_IN_OUT ), 0 ) FROM CONSUME_INFO WHERE DT_TRD BETWEEN TO_CHAR( TRUNC( SYSDATE, 'MM' ), 'YYYYMMDD' ) AND TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) AND NO_PERSON = PSI.NO_PERSON ) WHEN PSI.DT_BASIC < TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'DD' ) THEN( SELECT NVL( SUM( AMT_IN_OUT ), 0 ) FROM CONSUME_INFO WHERE DT_TRD BETWEEN TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM' )|| PSI.DT_BASIC AND TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) AND NO_PERSON = PSI.NO_PERSON ) WHEN PSI.DT_BASIC = TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'DD' ) THEN( SELECT NVL( SUM( AMT_IN_OUT ), 0 ) FROM CONSUME_INFO WHERE DT_TRD = TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) AND NO_PERSON = PSI.NO_PERSON ) WHEN PSI.DT_BASIC > TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'DD' ) THEN( SELECT NVL( SUM( AMT_IN_OUT ), 0 ) FROM CONSUME_INFO WHERE DT_TRD BETWEEN TO_CHAR( ADD_MONTHS( SYSDATE,- 1 ), 'YYYYMM' )|| PSI.DT_BASIC AND TO_CHAR( SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) AND NO_PERSON = PSI.NO_PERSON ) END SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT DECODE( LENGTH( DT_BASIC ), 1, '0' || DT_BASIC, DT_BASIC ) AS DT_BASIC, NO_PERSON FROM PERSON_SET_INFO ) PSI WHERE PSI.NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* com.koscom.main.dao.MainMapper.getMainAssetsSumAmt */ SELECT ( TB.SUM_AMT_BALANCE + TB.SUM_AMT_EVALUATION ) AS SUM_AMT FROM ( SELECT NVL( SUM( AMT_BALANCE ), 0 ) AS SUM_AMT_BALANCE, NVL( SUM( AMT_EVALUATION ), 0 ) AS SUM_AMT_EVALUATION FROM ASSETS_INFO WHERE DT_EXPIRE IS NULL AND NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) TB

/* com.koscom.main.dao.MainMapper.getMainDebtSumAmt */ SELECT NVL( SUM( AMT_REMAIN ), 0 ) AS SUM_AMT FROM DEBT_PERSONAL_INFO WHERE YMD_CANCEL IS NULL AND YMD_LOANEND IS NULL AND DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND NO_PERSON = #{no_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
